Using his sense of smell, Tucson follows his comrades scent and follows tha=
t down into the cave that was still in tact. He transforms into robot mode =
and cautiously makes his way down.

" I'm inside Lord Elder.  I can smell h=
im.  He's a bit of a ways down, but I know I will find him.   And I sense h=
umans, their scent is all around, yet I see no evidence of their presence. =
 But so help me Primus, if they have hurt him or any other innocent Maximal=
 or creature, I will serve them their consequences.  And they will have to =
serve them for as long as they live."

He narrows his eyes.

" Perhaps if f=
orced to defend what they have tried to destroy, they will think twice abou=
t laying harm on anything on this planet.  Their guilt may just get the bet=
ter of them."
